item.title: Urban combat training / Entraînement en zone urbaine
item.description:
Urban combat training / Entraînement en zone urbaine

Members of Operation REASSURANCE Land Task Force, Rotation 5, the Polish 25th Air Cavalry Brigade and 7th Coastal Defence Brigade take part in urban combat training, in the Drawsko Pomorskie Training Area, Poland on March 4 and 11, 2016.

item.title: AC-130W Stinger II Gunship Live-Fire & Air Refueling Mission
item.description:
AC-130W Stinger II Gunship Live-Fire & Air Refueling Mission

AC-130W Stinger II aircrew from 16th Special Operations Squadron, Cannon Air Force Base, N.M., conduct a live-fire and air refueling mission during Exercise Emerald Warrior 2016. The AC-130W Stinger II primary missions are close air support and air interdiction. Close air support missions include troops in contact, convoy escort and point air defense.

item.title: Canadian Armed Forces panel discussion on mental health
item.description:
Canadian Armed Forces panel discussion on mental health

In January 2016, a Canadian Armed Forces panel discussion on mental health and well being was held during the annual Bell Let's Talk campaign. Here is a clip of that discussion from our archives. #MentalHealthWeek #GetLoud #MHW2016

item.title: Aboard the Little But Very Fast US Navy Patrol Boat Armed With M2 Machine Gun .50 Caliber
item.description:
Aboard the Little But Very Fast US Navy Patrol Boat Armed With M2 Machine Gun .50 Caliber

U.S. Navy patrol boats conducting a search and rescue exercise. Video by Chief Petty Officer Larry Baruwa and Tech. Sgt. Michael Jackson Thumbnail Credit: Mike Baird from Flickr https://www.flickr.com/photos/72825507@N00/2087879492/ , Modified by Daily Military Defense & Archive Don't forget to subscribe us on Facebook or Twitter.

item.title: Phalanx CIWS Open Fire
item.description:
Phalanx CIWS Open Fire

A Phalanx Close-In Weapons System (CIWS) fires during a live-fire exercise onboard amphibious assault ship USS Boxer (LHD 4). AiirSource Military covers events and missions from the United States Armed Forces: Army, Navy, Marine Corps, Air Force, and Coast Guard. Visit our channel for more military videos: http://www.youtube.com/AiirSource Like & share this video to show your support!

item.title: I Feel Good
item.description:
I Feel Good

"I Feel Good" as performed by James Brown U.S Navy Band Cruisers featuring Musician 1st Class (AW) Cory Parker This version proceeded the more popular version "I Got You (I Feel Good)" with a different arrangement, including a stuttering rhythm and prominent baritone sax line, under the title "I Got You".

item.title: Gas Chamber - Possibly The Most Feared Event At Air Force Basic Training
item.description:
Gas Chamber - Possibly The Most Feared Event At Air Force Basic Training

Trainees in United States Air Force Basic Military Training learn how to properly don MOPP gear and then entering the CBRN Confidence Chamber at Joint Base San Antonio Lackland, Texas. MOPP (Mission Oriented Protective Posture) is a protective gear used by military personnel in a toxic environment, e.g., during a chemical, biological, radiological, or nuclear (CBRN) strike.

item.title: F-16 Fighter Jets at Bagram Airfield
item.description:
F-16 Fighter Jets at Bagram Airfield

The 457th Expeditionary Fighter Squadron arrived at Bagram Airfield. Includes footage of landings, taxiing, parking the planes, assorted shots of F-16s and Pilots, and interviews with the commander and one of the pilots. AiirSource Military covers events and missions from the United States Armed Forces: Army, Navy, Marine Corps, Air Force, and Coast Guard.

item.title: Boeing KC-135 Stratotanker Mid-Air Refueling Mission & Landing
item.description:
Boeing KC-135 Stratotanker Mid-Air Refueling Mission & Landing

Airmen assigned to the 340th Expeditionary Air Refueling Squadron deliver fuel to U.S. F-16s and F-15s during a refueling mission over Asia. AiirSource Military covers events and missions from the United States Armed Forces: Army, Navy, Marine Corps, Air Force, and Coast Guard.

item.title: A-29 Super Tucano Attack Aircraft In Action - Live Fire Training
item.description:
A-29 Super Tucano Attack Aircraft In Action - Live Fire Training

The Embraer EMB 314 Super Tucano, also named ALX or A-29 is a turboprop aircraft designed for light attack, counter insurgency, close air support, aerial reconnaissance missions in low threat environments, as well as providing pilot training.
